title: Ep. 244: Go Out in the Early Morning Sunlight and Brush Your Teeth After Dinner
description:
Why it’s important to go outside into the sunlight, how brushing your teeth after dinner can help with night snacking, and a dentist demerit from Elizabeth.
Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/238; 774-277-9336.
Get in touch on Instagram: @GretchenRubin & @LizCraft
